name: Cryptocurrency icons
description:
Are you working with cryptocurrency and crypto coins icons (logos) in your UX/UI projects?


We often needed to use cryptocurrency icons in our work. We have created our icon pack to streamline our process. The icons are placed as the components in the Figma library, and our team members have access to that, so when somebody needs a crypto icon, it's accessible from the assets panel in the Figma interface.


We decided to share this cryptocurrency icon pack in Figma format with everyone dealing with building interfaces for crypto exchange and wallet applications. 


Feel free to duplicate this file.


This file includes 475 icons of different cryptocurrency coins and tokens.


If you found this file helpful, don't forget to share it!
